comparison.description: How the experience points of the player should be compared to the specified value.
comparison.markdownDescription: How the experience points of the player should be compared to the specified value.

compare_to.description: Which value the experience points should be compared to.
compare_to.markdownDescription: Which value the experience points should be compared to.

type.description:
[Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/xp_points)

Checks the experience points of the entity.

Type ID: `origins:xp_points`

!!! note

    **This entity condition type will only work on players.**
